footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Furina | Update Date: 11/14/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Splendor of Tranquil Waters__
BiS, but may have energy issues.
__Festering Desire__
Better than almost every other 5 star and 4 star option, but a version 1.2 event weapon.
__Fleuve Cendre Ferryman__
Best permanent option, gained from fishing.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Primordial Jade Cutter, Key of Khaj-Nisut, Favonius Sword
__Light of Foliar Incision, Wolf Fang, Haran Geppaku Futsu, Mistsplitter Reforged__
Statsticks that may have useless passives. 

__Harbinger of Dawn__
3 star option, working only if you can provide very good healing uptime.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> HP% or Hydro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Let the People Rejoice
**1)** Elemental Skill: Salon Solitaire
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Soloist’s Solicitation 
*Normal Attack may remain at low talent levels even for C6*

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Energy Requirements are at 200% for Solo Hydro, 180% to 150% for Double Hydro and all the way to 130% with Triple Hydro or battery characters such as Raiden Shogun or Fischl.
*If met with substats or weapon, use the HP% sands.*

Due to how much DMG% she provides, HP% is similar to Hydro DMG Bonus% goblets. 
**For her teammates, ATK% DEF% and HP% goblets become much more viable.**
